name: Luxport
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam.

Make your way through an abandoned space station with your teleporter as your only source of light and hope.

Controls

Left Click - throw your teleporter
Right Click - return your teleporter to you
Escape - quit
R - restart level (useful if the physics glitches out!)

Credits

Programming: Sebastian Nordgren

Level Design & Sound: Tobias Lotz
